briefdescription.para: Q4_K (weights) x Q8_K (activations) kernels for inference.

detaileddescription.para: Implements decode-style matvec/matmul where weights are Q4_K and the activations are quantized on-the-fly to Q8_K. This is inference-only; no backward pass is provided here.
